text: When I upload images through the cli into my "custom-theme/images" folder, the ".webp" images are skipped. Is there support for .webp?

My understanding is that conversion and delivery is done on the server based on the users device - see Image Optimisation section <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/cdn|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/cdn> 
I upload Jpegs and PNGs but when I inspect the images itâ€™s often encoded as webp.
